languages.text: {n}Сенешаль едва заметно наклоняется к вам и говорит тихо — так, чтобы только вы могли слышать его.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, Гапраки — все или только некоторые — замешаны, но полагаю, что не они стоят за заговором против вас. Гален Гапрак мог быть лишь марионеткой в руках опытного кукловода. Именно его следует обличить, чтобы не допустить дальнейшего разрастания еретической заразы".

traits.locale_text: {n}Сенешаль едва заметно наклоняется к вам и говорит тихо — так, чтобы только вы могли слышать его.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, Гапраки — все или только некоторые — замешаны, но полагаю, что не они стоят за заговором против вас. Гален Гапрак был лишь марионеткой в руках опытного кукловода. Именно его следует обличить, чтобы не допустить дальнейшего разрастания еретической заразы".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}The Seneschal bows ever so slightly and speaks quietly so that only you can hear him:{/n} "Lord Captain, the Gapraks — all or perhaps only some of them — are definitely involved, but I suspect that they were not behind the plot against you. Halen Gaprak could be nothing more than a puppet in the hands of a deft puppet master. We must expose whoever that is if we are to prevent the pestilence of heresy from spreading any further."
languages.original_text: {n}Сенешаль едва заметно наклоняется к вам и говорит тихо — так, чтобы только вы могли слышать его.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, Гапраки — все или только некоторые — замешаны, но полагаю, что не они стоят за заговором против вас. Гален Гапрак мог быть лишь марионеткой в руках опытного кукловода. Именно его следует обличить, чтобы не допустить дальнейшего разрастания еретической заразы".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal bows ever so slightly and speaks quietly — so only you can hear him.{/n} "Lord Captain, the Gapraks — all or perhaps only some of them — are definitely involved, but I suspect that they are not behind the conspiracy against you. Halen Gaprak could be a simple puppet in the hands of a skilled puppeteer. And we must expose them to prevent the heretical plague from spreading any further."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The Seneschal bows ever so slightly and speaks quietly — so only you can hear him.{/n} "Lord Captain, the Gapraks — all or perhaps only some of them — are definitely involved, but I suspect that they are not behind the conspiracy against you. Halen Gaprak could be a simple puppet in the hands of a skilled puppeteer. And we must expose them to prevent the heretical plague from spreading any further."

Halen Gaprak could be a simple puppet in the hands of a deft puppeteer. And we must expose them to prevent the infectious heresy from spreading any further."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

Halen Gaprak could be nothing more than a puppet in the hands of a deft puppet master. We must expose whoever that is if we are to prevent the pestilence of heresy from spreading any further."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}家令長はごくわずかに頭を下げると、あなたにだけ聞こえるよう声を落として話す。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、ギャプラック家の…全員、あるいはごく一部の者たちは、確実に関与しています。しかしあなたを狙った陰謀の黒幕ではないでしょう。ヘイレン・ギャプラックは、黒幕の巧みな手腕に踊らされていた操り人形に過ぎない可能性があります。我々は人から人へと異端がさらに蔓延せぬよう、元凶を白日の下にさらさなくてはなりません」
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal bows ever so slightly and speaks quietly so that only you can hear him:{/n} "Lord Captain, the Gapraks — all or perhaps only some of them — are definitely involved, but I suspect that they were not behind the plot against you. Halen Gaprak could be nothing more than a puppet in the hands of a deft puppet master. We must expose whoever that is if we are to prevent the pestilence of heresy from spreading any further."

traits.locale_text: {n}家令長はごくわずかに頭を下げると、あなたにだけ聞こえるよう声を落として話す。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、ギャプラック家の…全員、あるいはごく一部の者たちは、確実に関与しています。しかしあなたを狙った陰謀の黒幕ではないでしょう。ヘイレン・ギャプラックは、黒幕の巧みな手腕に踊らされていた操り人形に過ぎない可能性があります。我々は人から人へと異端がさらに蔓延せぬよう、元凶を白日の下にさらさなくてはなりません」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德微微躬身，用只有你能听到的声音低语道。{/n}“舰长大人，贾帕克家族，或许是全族，又或许只是少数几人，肯定与此事脱不了关系。但我怀疑，他们并非真正的幕后黑手。哈伦·贾帕克不过是任人摆布的傀儡罢了。我们必须一口气追查出真正的主使，阻止那样的异端言论继续扩散。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal bows ever so slightly and speaks quietly so that only you can hear him:{/n} "Lord Captain, the Gapraks — all or perhaps only some of them — are definitely involved, but I suspect that they were not behind the plot against you. Halen Gaprak could be nothing more than a puppet in the hands of a deft puppet master. We must expose whoever that is if we are to prevent the pestilence of heresy from spreading any further."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德微微躬身，用只有你能听到的声音低语道。{/n}“舰长大人，贾帕克家族，或许是全族，又或许只是少数几人，肯定与此事脱不了关系。但我怀疑，他们并非真正的幕后黑手。哈伦·贾帕克不过是任人摆布的傀儡罢了。我们必须一口气追查出真正的主使，阻止那样的异端言论继续扩散。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le sénéchal se penche légèrement et vous dit à voix basse, de manière à ce que vous {mf|seul|seule} puissiez l'entendre :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les Gaprak sont impliqués dans quelque chose, c'est certain, mais je ne crois pas qu'ils soient à l'origine du complot qui vous vise. Halen Gaprak n'était sans doute rien de plus qu'une marionnette habilement manipulée. À charge pour nous de démasquer le marionnettiste avant qu'il ne répande davantage les miasmes de l'hérésie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal bows ever so slightly and speaks quietly so that only you can hear him:{/n} "Lord Captain, the Gapraks — all or perhaps only some of them — are definitely involved, but I suspect that they were not behind the plot against you. Halen Gaprak could be nothing more than a puppet in the hands of a deft puppet master. We must expose whoever that is if we are to prevent the pestilence of heresy from spreading any further."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sénéchal se penche légèrement et vous dit à voix basse, de manière à ce que vous {mf|seul|seule} puissiez l'entendre :{/n} « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les Gaprak sont impliqués dans quelque chose, c'est certain, mais je ne crois pas qu'ils soient à l'origine du complot qui vous vise. Halen Gaprak n'était sans doute rien de plus qu'une marionnette habilement manipulée. À charge pour nous de démasquer le marionnettiste avant qu'il ne répande davantage les miasmes de l'hérésie. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}El Senescal se inclina ante ti ligeramente y habla en voz baja para que nadie más pueda oírle.{/n} «Lord Capitán, los Gaprak, ya sean todos o solo algunos de ellos, están claramente involucrados, pero tengo la sospecha de que no están detrás del complot en su contra. Halen Gaprak podría ser una simple marioneta controlada desde las sombras. Debemos desenmascarar al verdadero artífice para evitar que esta maldita herejía siga extendiéndose».
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal bows ever so slightly and speaks quietly so that only you can hear him:{/n} "Lord Captain, the Gapraks — all or perhaps only some of them — are definitely involved, but I suspect that they were not behind the plot against you. Halen Gaprak could be nothing more than a puppet in the hands of a deft puppet master. We must expose whoever that is if we are to prevent the pestilence of heresy from spreading any further."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Senescal se inclina ante ti ligeramente y habla en voz baja para que nadie más pueda oírle.{/n} «Lord Capitán, los Gaprak, ya sean todos o solo algunos de ellos, están claramente involucrados, pero tengo la sospecha de que no están detrás del complot en su contra. Halen Gaprak podría ser una simple marioneta controlada desde las sombras. Debemos desenmascarar al verdadero artífice para evitar que esta maldita herejía siga extendiéndose».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Truchsess verneigt sich unmerklich und spricht so leise, dass nur du ihn hören kannst:{/n} "Lord Captain, die Gaprak – alle oder nur einige von ihnen – sind definitiv involviert, aber ich vermute, dass sie mit der Intrige gegen Euch nichts zu tun haben. Halen Gaprak könnte einfach nur eine Marionette in den Händen eines geschickten Puppenspielers sein. Diesen Puppenspieler müssen wir enttarnen, wenn wir verhindern wollen, dass sich die Pestilenz der Ketzerei weiter ausbreitet."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal bows ever so slightly and speaks quietly so that only you can hear him:{/n} "Lord Captain, the Gapraks — all or perhaps only some of them — are definitely involved, but I suspect that they were not behind the plot against you. Halen Gaprak could be nothing more than a puppet in the hands of a deft puppet master. We must expose whoever that is if we are to prevent the pestilence of heresy from spreading any further."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Truchsess verbeugt sich leicht und spricht leise, so dass nur du ihn hören kannst.{/n} "Lord Captain, die Gaprak — alle oder manche — sind definitiv beteiligt, doch ich vermute, dass sie nicht hinter der Intrige stecken, die auf Euer Leben abgezielt hat. Halen Gaprak könnte schlicht eine Marionette in den Händen eines gerissenen Puppenspielers sein. Und wir müssen ihn enttarnen, um zu verhindern, dass sich die ansteckende Ketzerei noch weiter verbreitet."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: {n}Seneşal, hafifçe eğilip yalnızca senin duyabileceğin bir ses tonunda konuşuyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, Gaprak tarafı kesinlikle bu işin içinde. Belki de hepsi. Fakat sanıyorum ki entrikanın arkasındakiler onlar değil. Halen Gaprak, becerikli bir kuklacının ellerindeki bir kukladan öte olmayabilir. Kâfirlik denen vebanın daha da yayılmasını önleyeceksek bu şahsı ifşa etmemiz şart."
languages.original_text: {n}The Seneschal bows ever so slightly and speaks quietly so that only you can hear him:{/n} "Lord Captain, the Gapraks — all or perhaps only some of them — are definitely involved, but I suspect that they were not behind the plot against you. Halen Gaprak could be nothing more than a puppet in the hands of a deft puppet master. We must expose whoever that is if we are to prevent the pestilence of heresy from spreading any further."

traits.locale_text: {n}Seneşal hafifçe eğilip yalnızca senin duyabileceğin bir ses tonunda konuşuyor:{/n} "Lord Kaptan, Gaprak tarafı kesinlikle bu işin içinde. Belki de hepsi. Fakat sanıyorum ki entrikanın arkasındakiler onlar değil. Halen Gaprak, becerikli bir kuklacının ellerindeki bir kukladan öte olmayabilir. Kâfirlik denen vebanın daha da yayılmasını önleyeceksek bu kişiyi ifşa etmemiz şart."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
